participant_1.background:
I have a computer science degree.
I am very shy.
I like to build model spaceships.
My mother is a medical doctor.

participant_2.background:

I like to go hunting.
I restore classic cars.
I am a handyman.
I am allergic to shellfish.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for a living?
I work for a company that rents properties.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What's your favorite part of the job?
I like the variety of work that I get to do. I get to meet a lot of different people, and I always have something new to learn.
That sounds really cool. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hunting, restore classic cars, and do handyman work around the house.
Wow, those are all really cool hobbies. I've always wanted to try hunting, but I'm not sure if I'm good enough.
It's not as hard as you think. You just have to be patient and persistent.
I'll have to give it a try sometime. What's your favorite part of hunting?
I like being outdoors and getting away from the hustle and bustle of city life. I also like the challenge of trying to outsmart the animals.
I can understand that. I'm not much of a hunter myself, but I do enjoy spending time in the outdoors.
Yeah, it's a great way to relax and recharge.
What's your favorite thing about restoring classic cars?
I like the challenge of bringing a car back to life. It's also really rewarding to see your work come together.
I bet that's really satisfying. I've always admired people who can restore cars. I'm not very handy myself.
It's not as hard as you think. You just have to be patient and willing to learn.
I might have to give it a try sometime. What do you like about being a handyman?
I like being able to fix things around the house and make it more comfortable. I also like the challenge of figuring out how to fix things.
I can understand that. I'm not very handy myself, but I do like being able to fix things around the house.
It's a good skill to have. It can save you a lot of money.
I'll have to remember that. I'm always looking for ways to save money.
Well, I'm glad we had this chat. It was nice to meet you.
You too. I'm glad I met you too.
